Since the first arrival of Europeans to the North American interior, many ethnic and religious groups have migrated to Manitoba, including:

* [Mennonites](https://htmlpreview.github.io/?https://github.com/onosson/LIPP_Atlas/blob/master/mennonite.html)
* [Filipinos](https://htmlpreview.github.io/?https://github.com/onosson/LIPP_Atlas/blob/master/filipino.html)
